title: 1993 Scottish Cup Final
text:
The 1993 Scottish Cup Final was played between <a href="Rangers%20F.C.">Rangers</a> and <a href="Aberdeen%20F.C.">Aberdeen</a> at <a href="Celtic%20Park">Celtic Park</a> on 29 May 1993. Owing to ground reconstruction at <a href="Hampden%20Park">Hampden Park</a>, the fixture was played at another stadium for the first time since <a href="1924%20Scottish%20Cup%20Final">1924</a>.
Rangers won the match 2–1, thereby securing a domestic <a href="treble%20%28association%20football%29">treble</a>. Rangers' scorers were <a href="Mark%20Hateley">Mark Hateley</a>, scoring in his second consecutive <a href="Scottish%20Cup%20Final">Scottish Cup Final</a>, and <a href="Neil%20Murray%20%28footballer%29">Neil Murray</a>. <a href="Lee%20Richardson%20%28footballer%29">Lee Richardson</a> scored Aberdeen's goal.
